cause.description:
Support the fight on Terrorism for a better today and future. Help us all make a safer world..without psycos who think that they are doing a favor for their country or leader by killing innocent humans!
1. Support Troops
2. Kill Any Alleged Terrorist
3. Help Make The World Safer and More Secure
cause.mission: Join Americas fight on terror and kill every terrorist
cause.name: Help America Kill Every Terrorist
